snippet: The capture, announced by the military government, was said to have been made at the border between Thailand and Cambodia.
abstract: Thai Gen Prayuth Chan-ocha, head of military government, announces arrest of man suspected of involvement in Bangkok shrine bombing, second arrest related to attack; authorities say suspect is foreigner and was arrested trying to cross into Cambodia.
lead_paragraph: The capture, announced by the military government, was said to have been made at the border between Thailand and Cambodia.

headline.main: A 2nd Suspect Is Arrested in Bangkok Shrine Bombing
headline.print_headline: A 2nd Suspect Is Arrested in Bangkok Shrine Bombing
